run_data.name: Build-and-Test
run_data.display_title: Use sarif format for Cppcheck on CI (#218)

head_commit.message:
Use sarif format for Cppcheck on CI (#218)

* Set Cppcheck output format to sarif
* Use sarif format for Cppcheck on CI and redirect stderr
* Add environment variables to control cppcheck execution
* Add step to upload sarif files
* Fix paths by appending file:///
* Use --output-file instead of redirecting output
